prod_desc: Rescue the sailor off the rocks just in time!
prod_long_desc:
Join the LEGO® City coast guard crew and make an exciting sailboat rescue, featuring a rescue craft with drop-down motors and spinning propellers, a sailboat with working rudder and mast that ‘breaks’, plus a rock island build. Includes 2 minifigures and a shark figure.
Includes 2 minifigures: a rescue pilot and a sailor, plus a shark figure.
Features a coast guard rescue craft with drop-down motors and spinning propellers, sailboat with working rudder, and toppling mast and sail, plus a rock island build.
Both boats float!
Spin the rescue craft propellers to cruise through the water and rescue the sailor.
Push the sail down to ‘break’ the mast.
Push the sail and mast back up to repair the sailboat once the sailor is safe.
Coast guard rescue craft measures over 1” high, 7” long and 3” wide.
Sailboat with sail up measures over 7” high, 9” long and 2” wide.
Rock island measures over 1” high, 1” wide and 5” long.
Shark figure measures over 2” long.
